title: El Maderal
typeOfFood: Vegan, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Spanish, Tapas
description: An all-vegan beer garden/cafe and smoothie/juice bar located between La Sagrada Familia and lâ€™Auditori. Has a warm and welcoming modern space where they serve sweet and savory dishes. Has 8 taps, some of which are craft beers, and gintonics with more than 100 references of gins, wines and natural cellars. Offers a variety of juices, shakes and smoothies, all of which are 100% natural and freshly prepared, in addition to teas, coffees and plant-based milks. Serves made-in-house tapas and dishes, plus cakes and cupcakes, all made with ingredients from local farmers. Also provides support to various animal sanctuaries.
